name: Community Media Forum Europe
goal: The CMFE is founded in 2004 to strengthen the participation of the “Third Media Sector” in European discussion and decision-making processes at a moment when freedom of expression and free access to information are increasingly endangered by the consequences of concentration in the media field. It is a network of policy experts, organizations and federations from now 26 European countries, which aim to support the role of Community Media on the European level.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Competition, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: media-pluralism, frequency-policy, digitalization, media-literacy, multilingualism, freedom of speech, citizens rights, local democracy, public service
